prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that resembles a small, fluffy creature with a cheerful demeanor.
Show me a pink, round Pokemon with big ears and a starry background.
Imagine a whimsical character that floats in the air, glowing softly under the moonlight.
Design a playful Pokemon with a round body, small hands, and a joyful expression.
Generate a character that loves to dance and spread happiness wherever it goes.
Make a fairy-type Pokemon that looks adorable and has a charming personality.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of friendship and joy in its appearance.
